text: Granulifusus pulchellus is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== * Hadorn R. & Chino M. 2005. A new Granulifusus (Gastropoda: Fasciolariidae) from Japan. Novapex 6(4): 111-113 Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Gastropods described in 2005
title: Granulifusus pulchellus
